original_title: Bob Seger & Jason Aldean - Live On CMT Crossroads
overview: When you take a legendary rock icon and a country superstar whoâ€™s at the height of his career, add in a stage, lights and two of the best bands around, musical magic is made.  Last month at The Factory in Franklin, Tenn., Bob Seger and Jason Aldean united for the first time on the CMT CROSSROADS stage for an end-of-the-year event that neither could turn down.
title: Bob Seger & Jason Aldean - Live On CMT Crossroads
